评论详情: I get sweaty and the traditional leather wallets can't handle it. The leather gets nasty, smelly, and the cash sometimes will get soaked too. I used to replace the wallets probably once a year either from it getting disgusting or falling apart from sweating.  I purchased my first Flowfold on Dec 2014, hoping for a minimalistic, lightweight yet durable wallet. It was the one I was looking for! It doesn't take up a big space, very durable, and easily wiped clean. I believe I could have kept mine for a little longer but my wife got me a new one as a part of my birthday gift.  The pictures are comparison between my "almost" 10 year old Flowfold wallet and a brand new one. I will be returning 10 years later for another one.

评论概述: Bought this years ago, it's by far the best vegan wallet ever
评论详情: far better than the $100 stainless steel fiber vegan wallet i bought before, which hardly lasted a couple of years.  this one is going strong for nearly 10 years

This is the second of these wallets I've purchased.  First lasted about 6 years, so this is a replacement.  I am extremely hard on wallets so I require something durable.  I am an engineer, I'm in the military, I camp and hike, and I need a wallet that is durable, waterproof, sweat proof, slim and unobtrusive, fits easily into lots of different sized pockets.  If that's what you need, this is a great wallet and well worth the price.  Plenty of room for all of my essentials, stays slim and doesn't get bulky like leather wallets.  It may not be pretty, but it works hard and does it's job.
I only wish they had even more color.  This wallet is indestructible !  It will never wear out.
Really helps to thin the wallet, much better for my back, decreases pain!!!  Will lasts for years!!!

Made in USA, top quality!  Finally decided to replace my old leather wallet, looked at various overpriced US made options before finding this guy.  It’s lighter, slimmer, and in all ways an improvement at a great price.  Love it.

评论概述: Bought thus wallet Aug 2015 - still using it.
评论详情: My wife says after 7 years, it's time for me to get a new wallet. I think the one I have is fine, but she wants it to look nicer when we go out. I'm going to buy this same wallet again.  Nuff said?

I live in a tropical location and leather wallets get moldy, and disgusting from sweat and humidity, leather soaks up sweat and wet bills are embarrassing to hand out.  This flowfold wallet solves this problem.  It's slim, but holds a lot of cards and cash.  It's pretty much impervious to moisture, and my last one survived for about 5 years before I decided to refresh it with a new color.  This sail cloth material is extremely durable and practical.  Expect to get bored with it before it fails you.  Then switch to a new color.

评论概述: Incredibly durable, I been using 6 years and still in great shape
评论详情: A very thin wallet. I like minimalist products, especially in a wallet. The absolute lightest and toughest full-size single-fold wallet. I thought it was fun and would last a season. 6 years later, going to get another just when this one wears out. Which hasn't happened yet. Love them. Going to gift a few for the holidays again this year.

评论概述: Great wallet, lasted me 7 years before I sought a replacement
评论详情: The wallet is incredibly durable. I put it in my back pocket, so I'm sitting on it all the time, and it took the better part of a decade to wear even aesthetic holes into the wallet. It's still very useable even today, I just wanted to pick up a new one with RFID blocking features. If you don't need RFID blocking and want a back pocket wallet that will last without breaking the bank, this is the one.

评论概述: Excellent wallet truly built for life
评论详情: It is not every day you find a product that really does live up to expectations- this wallet does! I thought I would give it a try- price was a bit high- but I wanted something durable that can take being accidentally washed- or dunked in the ocean. Most wallets last for two years at most- and I have used all types including the Tyvek ones-- after a few years the corners wear out. This was no exception and it started to fray in one of the corners. I did not expect to get a new one no questions asked- but I did. Have a look at the pictures- you can see that the wear in the corner is making the threading start to fray and the inner pockets show chafing wear. Still works great even after two years though. I passed the old one to my son who really wanted it- I have no doubts it will serve him well for several more years at least... I have no problems highly recommending flowfold and will be looking at whatever else they make. This kind or outstanding product and support DESERVES my continued patronage and I hope the company keeps making these wallets for a long time. I am a customer- I bought this flowfold and in no way was I given anything for free or incentivized in any way to review it. YMMV - but this one will take you there and back more than a few times.
Looks nice but does not hold up well at all!
I like it because it is slim. This is the third one I've purchased. They tend to last about four years or so before wearing out (nothing lasts forever).
My husband loves the wallet

评论概述: Most practical wallet I’ve ever owned.
评论详情: I bought a FlowFold bifold in the black sail cloth probably 8 years ago. It might have been when they first started. It had been great. Lightweight, extremely durable, water proof (the material itself- not the contents), and a conversation started. Couldn’t be happier and getting ready to purchase another one for the next 8 years.

评论概述: Get rid of that big wallet
评论详情: Getting tired of a thick wallet and a huge bulge in my back pocket. So my sons convinced me to try this wallet. They both had them and loved them.  It’s great! Thin but with plenty of room for my credit cards, license and cash.
I work and live with young kids and it's held up very well to their shenanigans. I would definitely suggest this wallet to anyone looking for a sleek yet durable design.
The wallet has a nice appearance, is thin and light.  It is designed so that it can hold a reasonable number of bills in the bill compartment as well as several credit cards and a licence.
Perfect size, lite weight, good construction..... get one.

评论概述: Very light and should be very durable
评论详情: Arrived quickly!  I would have liked additional compartments for the cards instead of just having to stack them together.  I like that it's so light and fits easily into my pocket.

This is a great wallet. Thin, cool looking, durable. It finally gave up in the past few months. I am buying another one today.  UPDATE: The second one only lasted 2 years... am I richer now? I don't think so. Not buying another one.
As described, light and compact

I have used this wallet for several years now. It barely shows any wear. It holds a lot of bills and cards and is perfect for me. Very comfortable in back pocket, and easy on the old butt cheek. I look forward of years more of use.

This is my second flowfold bifold wallet (puppy ate the last one after having it for 5 years). I love these things - the material is super durable and very lightweight. Very slim in your front pocket. Great design and manufacturing!
Just now starting to show a little wear... after 5 years.  That being said, I bet I get another 2 years out of this thing.  Will definitely buy again.

评论概述: Over five years later and still going strong...
评论详情: I rarely take the time to review products unless they have very low or very high performance.  This wallet is a high performer.  Everything as described, still going strong after 5+ years of everyday use (purchased May 2014), well worth the investment.  All stitching and fabric intact and no signs of deterioration (other than scuffing from cards).  I thought to review it because I am looking at ordering another version that is non fold so even more minimalist.  Not because this version is too large, just because now that I've become more used to carrying less, I can probably reduce it further.  BTW I usually carry about 4-5 ID cards, 3 credit cards and 5-10 bills and it is always unobtrusive even on the way home with receipts folded up inside.Good job to this creator/manufacturer Flowfold!

评论概述: Buy It For Life...not so much
评论详情: Decent wallet. Good size. Nice and basic. Lasted about 5 years coming apart at the seams and has a couple of abrasion holes. Purchased Jan. 2015. Buy it for life... of the product. Which really means it will last about as long as an average wallet. 2 stars removed for trying to make it sound exceptional when it is average.

I'm on my second one of these, first one stood up to years of abuse and would have lasted for several more. Rugged, my previous wallets were stingray and these wear like that, essentially iron. Couldn't be happier.

I've had this for 5 years and it is just now starting to fray a bit so I'm ordering another.It is much thinner and flexible than other wallets.  I carry 4 cards (including DL) and about 15 pieces of paper (health, insurance, etc.) and this wallet hold everything just fine.  I often carry it in the front pocket of pants for security and it is very comfortable.  If you have a relatively "light" load in your wallet, go with this and you'll never go back to leather.

Having used this wallet daily for four years, I finally noticed a small bit of fraying on the outer edge of the fold.  It's barely noticeable, and I can surely use the wallet for another couple years.  But I'm using this as an excuse to buy another of the exact same wallet, but in a brighter color.

评论概述: Very Small - not for people with lots of cards
评论详情: Wallet is very small and does not hold a lot. Card pockets are not set up for easy access or viewing of cards. Bought this as a gift and it was unusable by the recipient due to this. Return window is now closed and I'm stuck with a wallet no one wants.

I really like the way this wallet holds cards, there's basically no way for a card to accidentally fall out. Sharp design and super slim. Not a lot of capacity for cards but if you don't need a lot of cards on you it is great.

评论概述: Great gift for the men who have everything

Love it as it is so light weight.
My husband loves this wallet, light -weight, thin, and flexible.  Feels more secure with wallet in his front pocket.  Easier to retrievesince he has shoulder pain.

Very slim and durable.  Great for front-pocket carry.  Holds a good amount of cash/cards without the bulk of a traditional leather wallet.  No velcro to wear out and more "refined" than the old-school nylon "sport" wallets.
I loved my old leather wallet until I bought this! Holds more and is much slimmer than the old one (which was marketed as a slim wallet too). Very happy!
ordered this for my bf for v day to replace a similar product he had.  He absolutely LOVES it!! It fits in his pockets better than any other wallet he has ever had!

评论概述: Looks cool. Plenty of room in it.

I bought a Flowfold years ago. It lasted nicely, is very low profile/minimalist, and does exactly what I need from a wallet i.e. a few cards, a bit of cash. No bulk, no heft.  Great example of a fully functional product that does what it says it will do. I love the recycled sailcloth as well.

评论概述: This wallet has really held up

Made of clear plastic film & string. Feels so cheap, I hated using it. Bulky in pocket. As well, I accidentally washed this with my jeans & the plastic became puffy & deformed. Do not reccomend at all.
Been using for four years Tougher than any other fiber wallet I have had and does better when it gets wet than a leather wallet. In another 5 years I will buy another one when this one wears out.

Although they wallet looks and feels slightly different than I expected, it’s definitely a performer. It was so light and thin I actually didn’t feel it in my back pocket when driving. I feels and looks well made, but it tends to stay kinda open when sitting on a table, I’m guessing because it is new. Overall happy with my purchase.

评论概述: I’ve Owned This Wallet for 7 Years
评论详情: My wife (then girlfriend) bought me this wallet as a Christmas gift seven years ago, and I’ve carried it every day since. This thing is damn near indestructible. I’m the kind of guy that’s always carrying too much stuff in his wallet which can really wear on them as it stresses the material and seams. It’s only started to fray in the past year, so here I am adding another one to my list in the hopes that my wife gifts it to me again! This wallet has been around the world, and truthfully if I could sew sails into wallets, I’d keep this one. It’s that good!

Maybe it isn't stylish, in fact it might be ugly, however it doesn't stretch, and disappears in the pocket. I constantly have to check to make sure that it is in my pocket, it is that light and thin. I wouldn't go back to leather. I have used this daily for 6+ months, and it looks completely new. Amazingly tough for something so thin.

评论概述: and still love it. Incredibly durable and low profile

As advertised! Slim, rugged, I expect this wallet might be my last!

I have my wallet for about one year.  Holes are fully worn through on the bottom folded corner.  I went to the web site regarding the lifetime warranty and found that there is a warranty registration necessary, I did not do this when I received my wallet so I'm sure that I therefore do not have any recourse. I did like this wallet when I received it and even gave it a positive review.  Looking back I would not rate well a wallet that wears through in 14 months.  If you choose to purchase it find out the specifics of the warranty claim process first and make sure you register your purchase.  I will be looking elsewhere for my replacement.

its a nice, quality wallet. it seems durable. i was looking more for a minimalist wallet that was not much bigger in dimensions than my credit cards and this wallet is almost full size. another downside to it is that it is a slippery wallet and has fallen out of my back pocket a few times already when getting out of my car. that is dangerous in my opinion. Have searched for alternatives to the regular leather, fat wallet scenario, tried some different plastic ones, but came across this one on recommendation of a friend. If you like to bring a ton of cards everywhere with you you might not like it, but It'll hold 8+ easily, and I don't carry any more than that.

I've owned this walled for over a year and I absolutely love it. The build quality is awesome and it has held up extremely well. Not a single loose thread or defect from use. Perfect for the minimalist and unique compared to the wallets that most people have. Would recommend to anyone!

This was the first Flowfold product I purchased. I have since purchased another wallet and a duffle bag. Love all the products, but customer service is nonexistent. Cons: the only cons I've noticed in the 4 plus years I've been using it is that the bottom portion where the wallet bends is tending to fray/crack a little bit on the sail itself, but a hole has not yet formed. The only other reason I docked a star was that the look of the wallet (I own black and yellow) is a little loud. Not a big deal and they offer black versions which are more neutral.
